title: Felix the Cat
brief_description: A bag of high flying adventure with Felix the Cat. See Felix pull all elevators and airplanes out of his magic bag of tricks and fly to the moon with Pointdexter. Watch Felix capture Rock Bottom and delight in the antics of the professor. It’s all here in an hour of fun! Rated: G
